title: Linux Kernel Module
description: A multi-threaded kernel module I wrote in C to emulate a CPU scheduler.

title: SVM and Random Forest Mental Health Outcome Predictors
description: A data mining project that uses mental health data of gamers to predict their mental health outcomes.

title: K-Means Clustering Algorithm(s)
description: Two versions of the K-Means clustering algorithm written from scratch. One in C++. One in Python.

title: FAT32 File System in C
description: A command line interpreter and file image parser that reads hex data in a FAT32 file image and provides commands to navigate it, as well as read and write to the contents.
